name: Hand stamped spoon bowl necklace
description:
My original spoon bowl necklaces.

*Choose fancy font shown on Left and simple font shown on the right.

This price is for 3 names .
Need 4-6 names stamped? add 2.00

These arrive on a 24 inch ball metal chain.

I can fit about 3 names on a TSP easily.

Heart stamp at the bottom.
Hand made so imperfections are part of the charm.

Usually 3 beads per necklace. Great source of a little sparkle.

Unique and makes a great gift!

Only vintage silverplated spoons are used.
